(3) How does AI affect APIs?



APIs for AI: Problem or Not? Erik Wilde: Your APIs Are Not Ready for AI (Yet): A Lifecycle-Based Readiness Guide

(4) Model Context Protocol (MCP)

  • MCP seems to be the new standard protocol for LLM consumers
  • Many mapping tools to generate MCP from OpenAPI descriptions
  • Complex APIs will overload the MCP host's context
  • Larger API landscapes will overload the MCP host's context
